code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DiscussionBoard=()=>{const[discussions,setDiscussions]=useState([]);const[query,setQuery]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{const fetchDiscussions=async()=>{const response=await axios.get('http://localhost:8080/api/discussions');setDiscussions(response.data);};fetchDiscussions();},[]);const handleSearch=async()=>{const response=await axios.get("http://localhost:8080/api/discussions",{params:{search:query}});setDiscussions(response.data);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:query,onChange:e=>setQuery(e.target.value),placeholder:"\uD1A0\uB860 \uAC80\uC0C9"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSearch,children:"\uAC80\uC0C9"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:discussions.map(discussion=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:discussion.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:discussion.content})]},discussion.id))})]});};export default DiscussionBoard;
